title: Simple sans serif typeface
content:
Can anyone help me identify this typeface?

Sorry about the attachment, it would not insert image for some reason.

Many thanks,

Nat

author: The White Lion

comments.content: Yes, looks pretty bang on. Thank you very much Marten! Amazingly fast response too, thanks.
You’re welcome! _Amazingly fast_ is an exaggeration. Some of the folks here (Yves and the gang) often does it within the minute, so in comparison with that I’m slow...
